title: Expose metrics for AutoScaling plugins
description:
We should expose metrics such as:

	For each trigger:
	
		Type, number of runs, number of events generated, number of replays, number of exceptions
		Time spent waiting for action execution after event generation
		Number of successful and failed action executions
		Thread pool stats of scheduled executor and action executor
		Queue stats of event queues
		number of Listener fires, count of failures, time taken
